txt.en: 'Thanks again for your work restoring the Quick Post, [placeholder]! Our good name means so much to me!\n\n'Oh, there was one more thing. If you have a moment, tell me so.'

'No, I don't have any more mail for you to deliver -- I merely wanted to commend you for your service!\n\n'From now on, you are [placeholder] of the Quick Post! Thank you again for your service, and I'll call on you when we have need of you again!'
A True Friend to the Quick Post
'The Quick Post is doing well! No complaints for the moment!'
You have helped to restore the good name of the Quick Post, and Postmaster Proudfoot is delighted at what you have done.
Postmaster Proudfoot is in Michel Delving, near the Town Hole.\n\nPostmaster Proudfoot has asked you to speak with him about something.
